data.eml:eml: Morphological description and DNA barcoding of Hydrobaenus majus sp. nov. (Diptera: Chironomidae: Orthocladiinae) from the Russian Far East

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Makarchenko, Eugenyi A., Makarchenko, Marina A., Semenchenko, Alexander A. (2015): Morphological description and DNA barcoding of Hydrobaenus majus sp. nov. (Diptera: Chironomidae: Orthocladiinae) from the Russian Far East. Zootaxa 4000 (2): 287-293, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4000.2.7
